price: Ti Allāhu ni ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà nínú ilẹ̀. Dájúdájú A ti pa á láṣẹ fún àwọn tí A fún ní tírà ṣíwájú yín àti ẹ̀yin náa pé kí ẹ bẹ̀rù Allāhu. Tí ẹ bá sì ṣàì gbàgbọ́, dájúdájú ti Allāhu ni ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà nínú ilẹ̀. Allāhu sì ń jẹ́ Ọlọ́rọ̀, Ẹlẹ́yìn (tí ẹyìn tọ́ sí).
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ وَإِيَّاكُمۡ أَنِ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ وَإِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَنِيًّا حَمِيدٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi walaqad waṣṣaynā alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba min qablikum wa-iyyākum ani ittaqū al-laha wa-in takfurū fa-inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ghaniyyan ḥamīdan
